name: Falling boxes (auburus)
description:
Use your mouse the position the boxes to the correct spots. Drag 'n drop the boxes in the right spot to make them fall in the correct targets.

The obstacles will only interact with the boxes of the same color. 

This are the available obstacles:

  • LASERS: will destroy the boxes of the same color. Avoid it!
  •  IMPULSERS: will accelerate the box in the direction marked by the arrow. 
  • WALLS & SLIDERS: Will make the box collide or slide with them changing their paths. They can be used on your benefit.
